  1. Welcome to our new site!

    Welcome to the new website for the City of Halstead!  We are excited to present many new updates and services.  This website is still under construction and we will continue to work on it to better serve you.  Please continue to check back and follow our progress!  If you have any questions please contact City Hall at 316-835-2286.
